page.title: 04FECKENHAM COFE FIRST SCHOOL2
page.content:
MY DAY -THE HEADMISTRESS
Iarrive at school at about 8.15am. I unlock the school as there is no caretaker. The first thing I do is put the kettle on and make myself a cup of tea. Then I open the post. Most of the post goes straight in the bin as it is unsolicited mail.
Then I leave the secretary a list of things to be done. She is kept very busy as she only works 12 hours a week. She deals with letters, duplicating, forms for the office, school fund, savings and dinner money.
At 8.45 the bell goes for the start of the day. There are only two of us on the teaching staff. We take it in turns to take assembly.
